snp5.11:0.1_0: Book, the arrow springs from the underworld.
snp5.11:1.3_0: the great floods of the great hermits,
snp5.11:2.3_0: the great floods of the great hermits,
snp5.11:3.1_0: one with nothing, by not grasping:
snp5.11:3.4_0: holding birth and death at bait.
snp5.11:4.1_0: Those who have fully understood the mindful,
snp5.11:4.5_0: And the ten years of seniority.
